pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Exploring Areas of Value Creation</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Weâ€™re placing more rigor around the processes we follow in the office. We are loosening up the schedule so that it is easier to get earlier or same-day appointments, when needed. All patient calls are to be returned within an hour. Patients are not to wait more than fifteen minutes after their scheduled appointment time prior to seeing their doctor. We did a good job on all these before, but putting a metric in place has really helped us be more thoughtful about our actions.</welcomeText>
